https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1XV42Zu9taxluIKXMeV9OSpYCSq.jpg Billy Madison is the 27 year-old son of Bryan Madison, a very rich man who has made his living in the hotel industry. Billy stands to inherit his father's empire, but only if he can make it through all 12 grades, 2 weeks per grade, to prove that he has what it takes to run the family business. Billy Madison
